mapper.select: select s1.product_no, p1.product_name, s1.shop_no from shop_product s1 inner join shop s2 on s1.shop_no = s2.shop_no inner join product p1 on s1.product_no = p1.product_no where s2.member_no = #{mem_no}
select s1.product_no, p1.product_name from shop_product s1 inner join product p1 on s1.product_no = p1.product_no where s1.shop_no = #{shop_no} order by p1.product_name

select wishlist.product_no, p.product_name from wishlist LEFT JOIN (select * from shop_product where shop_no = #{shop_no})sp on wishlist.product_no = sp.product_no inner JOIN product p on wishlist.product_no = p.product_no where sp.product_no is null

select p.product_no, p.product_name from product p LEFT JOIN (select * from shop_product where shop_no = #{shop_no})sp on p.product_no = sp.product_no where sp.product_no is null order by p.product_name
mapper.delete: delete from shop_product where product_no = #{prod_no} and shop_no = #{shop_no}
